name: Rakshasa, Slayer
damage_vulnerabilities: piercing from magic weapons wielded by good creatures

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Three Rapier or Light Crossbow attacks.

actions.name: Rapier
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 9 (1d8+5) piercing damage + 7 (2d6) poison and target: DC 16 Con save or poisoned until end of its next turn.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit 80/320' one target 9 (1d8+5) piercing damage + 7 (2d6) poison and the target must make DC 16 Con save or be poisoned until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc: Cha (DC 16) no material components: At will: detect thoughts disguise self3/day: invisibility1/day: mislead

special_abilities.name: Limited Magic Immunity
special_abilities.desc: Can't be affected or detected by spells of 4th level or lower unless it wishes to be. Has advantage on saves vs. all other spells and magical effects.
